WorkItem.ClosedComment: Problem should be fixed in most recent change set.
WorkItem.Description:
The warlock mod still freezes up when I try to add spells to the casting priority list. I've tried about 10 times now to put in the Affliction rotation, but it freezes when I hit "save." I've tried letting it sit for 5 minutes or more, but Rawr just stays frozen. 
 
The warlock profile I was using *is* an affliction spec, so I don't know what could be the problem, other than some sort of bug.
 
edit: I am running Windows Vista, 64 bit. Is there any other information about my system that might be relevant?
 
edit: Ok, so here's a step-by-step on how to crash it: 
1) Put the priority list as follows: Haunt, Corruption, Curse of Agony, Shadow Bolt.
2) Put Unstable Affliction at the bottom of the list. It shouldn't crash.
3) Now, put UA right above Shadow Bolt. This will crash it.

Comments.Message:
I'm having the same problem.  FYI the spec I am using is http://www.wowhead.com/?talent#IfxrbzMAoVAoIktZE00V:TcIzV0
The rotation I am using is:
Haunt
Corruption
UA
CoA
Shadow Bolt
The only other change I made was selected Undead as race and selected the imp as a pet.

Another note, if I put in the rotation before the talents it works but it crashes when I put the talent point into UA or Haunt.
I am using WinXP 32bit.

Hz has noted in a couple places that the errors people are seeing largely come from using bad rotations. Your filler spell MUST be at the bottom as well as a couple other things. I'll let him explain it further.
no their rotations look fine, I'll take some time and try to figure out why this is happening tonight
debugged on the train ride home, problem appears to be timeTillNextSpell I will come up with a fix soon...
